messages.message:
Just a few tidbits: we now have 26 services and a brand new Monitoring stack as well as UDF framework is in the works. We will start assessing which services to purge and which services to merge end of Q2/early Q3. Our stack is on its way to become massive unless we continue to clean up. ```core
--------------------
$(redis)
$(rabbitmq)
$(elasticsearch)
$(account_tservice)
$(repo_tservice)
$(mount_tservice)
$(file_tservice)
$(table_tservice)

data
--------------------
$(refiner_tservice)
$(pdf_tservice)
$(ocr_ari_service)
$(ocr_ari_11_service)
$(ocr_emerson)
$(search_tservice)
$(nlp_service)

workers
--------------------
$(celery_flower)
$(celery_app_tasks)
$(celery_core_tasks)
$(celery_webdriver_tasks)

web
--------------------
$(webapp)
$(api_server_apps)
$(apps_server)
$(api_server)
$(server_nginx)

notebook
--------------------
$(dynamic_proxy)
$(nb_reaper)

In Future
--------------------
Prometheus Stack
FluentD
Jager
istio Stack
udf framework
New ocr service
```
